answerText: Copper [accept Cu][10] This reaction uses nitrites and copper (I) halides to turn aryl diazonium salts into aryl halides.
heading: ACF Regionals |2012 | Maryland A + Chicago B | 11 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Name some uses of a certain metal in organic chemistry, for 10 points each. [10] This metal is found in Fehling's A solution where it precipitates as a red solid, but more commonly it is found in its blue plus two oxidation state,
